review.title: “Fordland R-3 schools”
review.pros: Pros – Small class sizes, friendly staff, and great kids make Fordland a good place to work. The administration do an acceptable job overall.
review.cons: Cons – Some cons include low pay overall, low pay for extra duty stipends, lack of communication between admins and staff, and a weak discipline policy.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be stricter on the repeat offenders, be open with the staff regarding important info that we need to know, and match area locales on extra duty stipends.
